Title: The 112th Congress
Writer: Aaron Sorkin (created by), Paul Redford (head writer), Aaron Sorkin, David Handelman (story editor), Ian Reichbach (story editor), Brendan Fehily (staff writer), Cinque Henderson (staff writer), Corinne Kingsbury (staff writer), Amy Rice (staff writer), Gideon Yago
Actors: Jeff Daniels, Emily Mortimer, John Gallagher Jr., Alison Pill
Plot: As the news team covers the Tea Party candidates during the US Congressional mid-term elections, the network 's senior executives confront Charlie about Will's newly confrontational tone.
